DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability PF-04447943 , multiple dos donepezil healthy volunteer . Evaluate plasma drug level PF-04447943 donepezil .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Safety , Tolerability And Plasma Drug Levels Of PF-04447943 When Administered With Donepezil To Healthy Volunteer Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate safety tolerability PF-04447943 , multiple dos donepezil healthy volunteer . Evaluate plasma drug level PF-04447943 donepezil .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female nonchildbearing potential subject age 21 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12 lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Pregnant nursing female ; female childbearing potential .
